sentences.speaker: Jake
sentences.sentence: Excuse me, could I get some help?

sentences.speaker: Nancy
sentences.sentence: Of course! What are you looking for?

sentences.speaker: Jake
sentences.sentence: I want to find a special gift for my wife.

sentences.speaker: Nancy
sentences.sentence: Sure thing. Any specific type she would enjoy?

sentences.speaker: Jake
sentences.sentence: She really likes things that smell nice.

sentences.speaker: Nancy
sentences.sentence: We have a wide variety of fragrances. Let me show you.

sentences.speaker: Nancy
sentences.sentence: No problem at all. Please follow me.

expressions.desc: Jake는 선물을 찾는데 Nancy에게 도움을 청하고 있습니다.
expressions.example_en: Can I get some help with these boxes?
expressions.example_ko: 이 박스들 좀 들어주실 수 있나요?

sentences.sentence: 제 아내를 위한 특별한 선물을 찾고 싶습니다.
그럼요. 그녀가 좋아할 만한 특정한 종류가 있나요?
그녀는 향이 좋은 물건을 정말 좋아해요.
우리는 다양한 향수를 갖추고 있습니다. 제가 보여드릴게요.
